�Hedge�          �Sniper�                �Sqril�          �Pyrotic�      
�Ostick�       �Ga-ga-bot�           �Thug-bot�

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Sqril   Ga-ga-bot

   "Okay, like first I am like going to turn on the like, you know, shields. 
  Ohh my god, they like better work.  I am like going to like set the shield 
generator thing to 90% Power.  Then i am like going to like need you to 
like, you know, help me carry and set up the auto guns.  Is that like cool 
with you or like what?"  Sqril says.

   Ga-ga-bot just stares at Sqril.

   "Ohh my god, like you do know that its like not nice to like stare.  I'll 
take that to be like an yes."  Sqril says as she walks off.

   Ga-ga-bot wakes up from a day dream he is having about Sqril,  "Where you 
going."

   "To like turn on the shields silly."  Sqril says with a giggle.  "Hehehe, 
now like get the autoguns like ready for us to them out there."

   "Right."  Ga-ga-bot says as he walks towards the autoguns, the whole time 
staring at Sqril.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Sniper   Pyrotic

   Pyrotic was a happy bot.  He was in charge on the bridge.  He got to sit 
in the command chair.

   "Private Sniper,  Put the Radar on the main screen."  Pyrotic says.

   "Yes sir." Sniper says as the main screen turns ti the radar.

   Sniper was trying to figure out any bases comm frequencies.  He sent out 
a message on all frequencies.  "Hello, I am a soldier in the small faction 
that just crashed.  We were wondering if some predacons want to talk about 
an alliance."

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Hedge

   Hedge was on her private computer going through all the security tapes, 
trying to figure out who was the bomber was.  She found out who the bomber 
was.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Ostick  Thug-bot

   Ostick and Thug-bot were both trying to put out the fire when both there 
comm went off.  It was Hedge.  "You two, report to the bridge immediately.
